--------------------------------------------------------

MADE BY FLOP MTL TEAM 2018

--------------------------------------------------------

Lost Signals is a collection of mini-games and media, told through an old TV set and a floating record player. Given the theme, we focused on the transformation of signal when communicated; how the medium alters its representation and how that representation translates to another when transmitted anew. The communication to the player, with weird and increasingly garbled aesthetics invites the player to delve deeper into the record.

--------------------------------------------------------

TECH : 

Music composed with iRig, Maschine, Cubase 5, Garageband.
Art in Aseprite, Gimp, Photoshop, Blender.
Programming in VS Code & Monodevelop.

Audio recorded on site.

All assets made during the jam
